trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Noblesville
There were no other sightings in Noblesville on or around April 17th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: i was sitting in my backyard saturday night,4\16\05, when i noticed a bright orange light in the northwest sky. the sky was mostly clear with a half moon in the western sky. i initialy thought it was a commercial aircraft. the light then split into two lights. again, i thought it to be a plane in a pattern. however, the lidht then split to three then four and finaly six seprate lights, same orange color, same intensity. this was observed by five other witnesess. they looked like a strind of bright orange pearls. this lasted approximitley ten seconds. at that point, the lights merged into one source, and then vanished. i am a e.r. nurse with twenty five years experience and have good assesment skills. this was like nothing i have ever seen. it did remind me of the accounts of the phoenix lights witnesses. regards, mike cluggish
